name: Orcaverns
description:
Stealth Hack 'n Slash platformer about a dwarf killing orcs in a cave.

Kill all the orcs without being seen, or risk them all chasing you.

Prototype made in 4 days, will make into full game if people like it.

Controls: Arrow Keys to Move, and C to Jump. X for leaping attack, Z for slash attack.

Update: Bug Fixes
